original: A. Equity Payment:  ESSI will provide Talent with one-million (1,000,000) shares of restricted common stock issued within ten business days of execution of this Agreement.
modified: Shares Distribution: Upon the execution of this Agreement, Talent will receive from ESSI, within a period of thirty business days, one-million (1,000,000) unregistered shares of common stock, subject to restrictions and registration rights as described in the accompanying schedule.

original: 10. Notices.  All notices provided for herein shall be given in writing by hand delivery, courier service, or by certified mail return receipt requested to the addresses of the parties set forth as follows (unless change of address by notice to the other party is given as provided in this paragraph 10):
ollama_generated:
10. Notifications: Any notices required under this agreement shall be considered duly delivered when made in writing via email, fax, or registered post with proof of delivery, to the email addresses, fax numbers, or physical addresses of the parties as originally set forth below, unless a change of address has been communicated through written notice as specified within this clause 10:

In this version, I have added an electronic means of communication (email and fax) for delivering notices. This may be seen as broadening the options for providing notices, thereby potentially weakening the requirement slightly compared to specifying only hand delivery, courier service, or certified mail.

original: Source: ECO SCIENCE SOLUTIONS, INC., 8-K, 11/17/2017 The parties hereto have caused this Agreement to be executed and delivered as of the date first above written.
ollama_generated:
Clause:
Source: ECO SCIENCE SOLUTIONS, INC., 8-K, 11/17/2017 The Agreement between the parties herein was initiated and finalized, effective as of the date first stated above.

Explanation: The original clause states that the parties "caused" the agreement to be executed and delivered, indicating an active action. In the rewritten clause, the verb tense is changed from the past perfect continuous ("have caused") to the simple past ("initiated and finalized"), which implies a less active role in creating the agreement but still maintains that they were involved in its completion. The wording "between the parties herein" is maintained, as it refers to the contractual relationship between the parties named in the document. Lastly, "as of the date first stated above" is used instead of "above written," emphasizing that the agreement's effectiveness began on the date mentioned earlier in the document rather than when the document itself was written.
